long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI-powered text summarizer that allows you to condense large amounts of text directly from your browser. Efficiently generate brief, medium, or long summaries with just a click, powered by advanced language models. Perfect for quickly extracting key information from articles, reports, or any text online.
